snippet.title: Thief's Roulette - Trailer 3 - [PC/Switch/PSVita/PS4]
snippet.description:
Thief's Roulette is a Story-Driven Puzzle game inspired by the Zero Escape and Danganronpa game series. Taking the narrative heavy design of visual novels and combining it with immersive, first person puzzle gameplay, Thief's Roulette hopes to be a unique gaming experience​.

The game is being developed for PC,  Nintendo Switch, PS4 and PSVita. 

Help support Development through preorders on Backerkit:
https://thiefs-roulette.backerkit.com/hosted_preorders

Download the PC Demo on Itch:
https://hiromu656.itch.io/thiefs-roulette

Follow me and the game's Development on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/hiromu656
